Book Title: American Dirt (Oprah's Book Club): A Novel
Comment on book: about the ordeal of a Mexican woman who had to leave behind her life and escape
It debuted at number one on The New York Times fiction best-seller list. HBO acquired the rights to develop a limited series with Bennett as executive producer.

Book Title: The Ballad Of Songbirds And Snakes
Comment on book: The Ballad of Songbirds and Snakes is a dystopian action-adventure novel by American author Suzanne Collins.
It is chronologically the last installment of The Hunger Games series, following 2008's The Hunger Games and 2009's Catching Fire.
